sourcesContent:
/* eslint-disable react/no-unescaped-entities */ /* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */ import React from 'react'; import { Dismiss } from '@../../../../reactify/build'; import { simpleCode, disabledCode, customThemeCode, borderPositionCode, customColorCode, childrenCode, customClassCode, } from './code-refrence'; import './dismiss.scss'; import DemoCard from '../../components/demo-card'; const DismissDemo = () => (
A simple Dismiss This is disabled This is a left Dismiss!
This is a right Dismiss!
This is a top Dismiss!
This is a bottom Dismiss!
This is all direction Dismiss!
This is a two direction Dismiss!
Card title

Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content.

Go somewhere
Dismiss with custom border color This Dismiss has custom class Primary theme Dismiss uses this theme by default
Secondary theme
Dark theme
Light theme
Info theme
Warning theme
Danger theme
Success theme
); export default DismissDemo;
